#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
int numbits(int v)
{
	unsigned int r = 0; // r will be lg(v)
	while(v>0)
	{
		v=v/2;
		r++;		
	}
	return r;
}
int  count_bits(int v)
{     
	unsigned int r = 0; // r will be lg(v)
	while(v>0)
	{
		if(v%2==1)
		{
			r++;
		}
		v=v/2;		
	}
	return r;
}
int imax(int m,int n)
{
	if(m>n)
		return m;
	else return n;
}
int imin(int m,int n)
{
	if(m<n)
	{
		return m;
	}
	else return n;
}
int score(int v)
{
	if(v==0)
	{
		return 0;
	}
	// printf("\n");
	int o=count_bits(v);
	int z=numbits(v)-o;
	return 2*o+z-2;
}
int main()
{
	int T;
	int Ti;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	int N;
	int bits;
	int i;
	int m,n;
	int ans;
	for (Ti= 0;Ti<T;Ti++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&N);
		bits=numbits(N);

		if(count_bits(N)==1)
		{
			printf("%d\n",bits-2);
		}
		else
		{
			ans=1000000;
			m=0;
			for(i=1;i<bits;i++)
			{
				m=N&((1<<i)- 1);
				n=N-m;
				ans=imin(ans,imax(score(m),score(n)));
			}
			printf("%d\n",ans);
		}

	}
	return 0;
}
